deployProxy(bytes,address,bytes).details: Deploys a proxy contract. Checks the given signature to make sure the right implementation address is set.

params.implementation: The address of the implementation to set
params.initcode: The initcode to be executed for contract creation
params.signature: Signature of owner of the used implementation address*

deployProxy(bytes,address,bytes).details: Deploys a proxy contract. Checks the given signature to make sure the right implementation address is set.

params.implementation: The address of the implementation to set
params.initcode: The initcode to be executed for contract creation
params.signature: Signature of owner of the used implementation address*

deployProxy(bytes,address,bytes).notice: Deploys a proxy contract by executing `initcode` and set the implementation at `implementation`
Deploys a proxy contract by executing `initcode` and set the implementation at `implementation`
